Home is a Place of Peace
Oh Lord, My God in Heaven
See the Mighty Mount of Zion
How Great the Day When Christ Shall Come
How Sweet the Joy That Easter Morn

data.title: We Will Gather All Our Family
When Saints Unite to Sing God’s Praise
God Did Provide Himself a Lamb
I Bow My Head and Still My Mind
May Thy Day Star Rise in Me
My Father, I Will Cry to Thee
The Sabbath Dawns a Holier Light
The Spirit Is a Gift from Thee
The Tender Mercies of the Lord
Abide in Me, O Love of God, Abide!
Come and Watch with Christ Our Savior
Oh, Lord, Be Thou My Shepherd
Oh, May My Mind Be Stayed on Thee
Ring, O Hills, with Songs of Zion
Within My Heart, O God, Prepare
Behold, How the Splendor of Zion Arises
Fear Thou Not; I Have Redeemed Thee
I’ll Work Where Thou Hast Shown
Now is the Hour for Faith Not Fear
On This Holy Day of Worship
The Sabbath Dawns with Restful Light
The Sabbath is a Sweet Delight
White as Wool and Clean Again
As Blessings Flow From Heav’nly Realms
Father, God of All I See
Armed with the Power of God
